Unlocking the Web: A Journey into Accessibility

2024-06-18T11:00:00Z

Join me for an exciting journey into the world of web accessibility! 🌐✨ Discover how I got into #a11y and why it's essential for for everyone to consider. Learn about common web accessibility mistakes and see practical, easy-to-implement solutions that can transform your web projects into more inclusive and user-friendly experiences. Don't miss this opportunity to elevate your skills and make a meaningful impact. Together, let's create a more accessible web for everyone!

Speakers

Delphine MILLET
